trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Fort Garland
There were no other sightings in Fort Garland on or around April 5th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsRight after sunset saw a bright light roughly above Alamosa about 35 degrees up west north west from my cabin. Very bright light stayed on for 10 seconds blinked off for 2 seconds came back one for about 4 seconds then lights streaked away to the south west leaving a brief contrail.
